mdRecord.dcterms:title: CIRCLE OF POWER/MATT X
mdRecord.dcterms:description: elf-taught artist Hugo perger was born in Italy and afterwards his family resettles in upstate New York. After a stint in the U. . Army, perger lived in rural Kentucky. A prolific artist, perger created hundreds of paintings for over 40 years. Focusing on biblical scenes, his work gained attention after his death and was subsequently included in several exhibitions.
